Class DateControl

All Implemented Interfaces:
ApplicationComponent, ApplicationService, ApplicationWidget, Component, Composite, Composite.CompositeComponent, Composite.CompositeService, Composite.CompositeWidget, Control, FilteredInputControl, FormElementAware, Serializable, Service, Viewable, Viewable.ViewableComponent, Viewable.ViewableService, Viewable.ViewableWidget, Widget
public class DateControl
extends TimestampControl

This class represents a TimestampControl, that holds only date - that is it's default pattern is "dd.MM.yyyy".

Author:
Jevgeni Kabanov (ekabanov at araneaframework dot org)
See Also:
Serialized Form

fromRequest

protected Object fromRequest(String parameterValue)
Description copied from class: TimestampControl
Parses the parameter using the dateTimeFormat, trying to get Timestamp. Adds a error.form.date.wrongformat error message if it fails.

Overrides:
fromRequest in class TimestampControl

getCalendarInstance

protected Calendar getCalendarInstance()
Used by fromRequest(String) to acquire Calendar instance for converting value read from request to TimeStamp

Returns:
Calendar using the default time zone and default locale.
